channel.title: Hi, Pierre here, getting started with research
channel.description:
Hi everyone, my name is Pierre and I am a software developer. I also love creating products, but I have been bitten a few times in the past by creating websites and services that don't solve a problem or connect properly with a group of people.
Right now I am actively looking for different forums and groups on the internet where I can start participating and over time understand issues in the different communities.
If you know of any great, active Facebook groups, LinkedIn groups or forums, then let me know :slight_smile: I am still trying to figure out exactly which kind of groups I am most interested in.
